title: Swiss muesli
description: This is a great healthy breakfast that you can make in large quantities to last the week.

default: 110g /4oz hazelnuts, split in half and roasted
2 apples (coxes or granny smiths) peeled and coarsely grated
1 small tub Greek or natural yoghurt

steps: In a large bowl mix together the oats, raisins, apricots and hazelnuts. Pour over the apple juice and leave for 10-15 minutes to allow the oats and dried fruit to soak up the juice.
Divide the muesli between 6 glass bowls and top with the grated apple. Spoon on a dollop of yoghurt and drizzle over some honey. Serve immediately.
